headline.main: FINNS' NEW VICTORY AIDS POLITICAL AIM; Petrozavodsk Capture Viewed as Milestone in Effort to Make Frontier Secure SOVIET LOSS DISCOUNTED Planned Withdrawal Indicated -- Mild Reply to the British Warning Expected Soon

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Oct. 1 -- After twelve days of bitter fighting Finnish troops today captured Petrozavodsk, the capital of Soviet Karelia, it was officially announced in Helsinki.
snippet: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Oct. 1 -- After twelve days of bitter fighting Finnish troops today captured Petrozavodsk, the capital of Soviet Karelia, it was officially announced in Helsinki....

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
